entry.title: https://github.com/OWASP/wstg
entry.content: The Web Security Testing Guide is a comprehensive Open Source guide to testing the security of web applications and web services.

entry.title: https://github.com/RAJANAGORI/Nightingale
entry.content: Nightingale Docker for Pentesters is a comprehensive Dockerized environment tailored for penetration testing and vulnerability assessment. It comes preconfigured with all essential tools and utilities required for efficient Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing (VAPT), streamlining the setup process for security professionals.

entry.title: https://github.com/abarichello/godot-ci
entry.content: Docker image to export Godot Engine games. Templates for Gitlab CI and GitHub Actions to deploy to GitLab Pages/GitHub Pages/Itch.io.

entry.content: A curated list of threat modeling resources (Books, courses - free and paid, videos, tools, tutorials and workshops to practice on ) for learning Threat modeling and initial phases of security review.

entry.content: Self-Hosting Guide. Learn all about locally hosting (on premises & private web servers) and managing software applications by yourself or your organization. Including Cloud, LLMs, WireGuard, Automation, Home Assistant, and Networking.

entry.title: https://github.com/oxsecurity/megalinter
entry.content: 🦙 MegaLinter analyzes 50 languages, 22 formats, 21 tooling formats, excessive copy-pastes, spelling mistakes and security issues in your repository sources with a GitHub Action, other CI tools or locally.
